title: Counting values in an array - describe behavior

content.question: Which of the following best describes the value printed by the code segment?

choices.label: The number of negative elements in  data
The number of positive elements in  data
The number of elements in  data  that are greater than the first element in  data
The number of elements in  data  that are less than than the first element in  data

content.answer: The number of elements in  data  that are greater than the first element in  data

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
